p: All plant taxa with medicinal uses mentioned in the 28 studies were incorporated into the MAMPDB after verifying their taxonomic identity with www.theplantlist.org (accessed 06.06.2016). Family affiliations of angiosperms follow the more up-to-date APG IV ( The Angiosperm Phylogeny Group, 2016). In case several members of the same genus are used interchangeably under the same vernacular name for the same purpose, the taxon is denoted Genus sp. Infraspecific taxa are not specified.
